Package org.phantomapi.command

Contains a command system built on it's own for ease of use

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandListener
    A Basic command listener
    CommandMessenger
    Command messenger
    PhantomCommandSender
    Command sender wrapper
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandBus  
    CommandController  
    CommandEventBus  
    PhantomCommand
    A command object/event
    PhantomSender
    Command sender wrapper
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CommandResult
    Command result
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Command
    Represents a firable command
    CommandAlias
    Represents a firable aliased command
    CommandFilter
    A Command Filter
    CommandFilter.ArgumentRange
    Filters the argument ranges
    CommandFilter.ConsoleOnly
    Filter players only
    CommandFilter.OperatorOnly
    Filter ops only
    CommandFilter.Permission
    Filter based on a required permission
    CommandFilter.Permissions
    Filter based on multiple required permissions
    CommandFilter.PlayerOnly
    Filter players only
    CommandFilter.SubCommands
    Define sub commands that must be filled to fire this command
    CommandFilter.Tag
    Define the tag for this command response
    CommandFilter.TagHover
    Define the tag hover for this command response

Package org.phantomapi.command Description

Contains a command system built on it's own for ease of use
